channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Chinese Naval and Research Vessels Spotted Close to Taiwan
item.description: Chinese research and naval vessels were spotted near Taiwan's territory off the eastern coast of Hualien County and the outlying Penghu Islands.

item.title: Taiwan's Death Row Inmates Argue Capital Punishment Is Unconstitutional
item.description: Death row inmates are challenging Taiwan's use of the death penalty at the country's Constitutional Court.

item.title: Dozens of Sizeable Earthquakes Rock Taiwan in 24 Hours
item.description: More buildings in Taiwan's eastern Hualien County have been damaged by a series of strong aftershocks following the massive magnitude 7.2 earthquake that struck on April 3rd. Peopl

item.title: Taiwan's Export Orders Dropped in March, Growth Expected Next Quarter
item.description: Taiwan export orders in the first quarter fell over 2% year-on-year, but the government says it expects to see positive growth in Q2.
